title: Did the New York Times Contradict Their 20 January 2017 Report About Wiretapping?
subtitle: An image showing a New York Times front page was circulated on social media along with statements accusing the publication of contradictory reporting about wiretaps.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The New York Times contradicted their 20 January 2017 report about wire tapping in an article entitled "Trump, Offering No Evidence, Says Obama Tapped His Phones."
